caption: The food was amazing! Chicken was nice and juicy, everything was filling, and the workers are super great! I ordered through Uber eats and had issues with Uber. The manager ray helped me out big time! I’m making sure I got my food. Him and his worker who I did not get her name, but she was so helpful over the phone. During hard times with the virus this was one of the few locals opened and even though my Uber service was trash he made sure I got my food in one piece. I really appreciate this place and people like this who help during tough times. My four year old is a picky eater and ate it all that’s how I know the food is also great!

(Translated by Google) Worst food restaurant there can be super overheated food the bathroom a mess  (Original) El peor restaurante de comida que puede haber comida super recalentada el baño un desorden
(Translated by Google) Dominican typical food. Very tasty dishes  (Original) Comida tipica Dominicana.  Muy sabrosos platos

Pass the place all the time on my way to the Post Office and finally stopped in. Met Ray who took over in May and he was the nicest guy. Seems to have done a great job turning the place around compared to previous reviews. Food/service was great and very friendly. Give this place a shout if you’re in the area!

They are racist and very rude. I was unhappy with my order and requested a refund. The women grabbed weapons banging them on the counter attempting to scare me off. They spoke about me in Spanish to other customers who arrived during this altercation. I eventually got my money back after they threatened to call police on me. I do not recommend
the most horrible food i paid and left  the rice looked like  it was made  yesterday the waiters are nasty horrible customer service .  these women think they dancing in a pole

(Translated by Google) They have to change cooks he is bankrupting that business and the owner is starving new management and new changes in that business if anyone is interested in buying it please stop by the only good thing there are the beers  (Original) Tienen que cambiar de cocinero él está llevando ese negocio a la quiebra y el dueño es un muerto de hambre nueva administración y nuevos cambios en ese negocio si alguien le interesa comprarlo por favor pasen por allí lo único bueno de allí son las cervezas
(Translated by Google) The food in this place is not good at all 👎👎👎👎👎  (Original) La comida de este lugar no es para nada buena 👎👎👎👎👎

I am familiar with the Caridad Restaurant chain. I've eaten at a couple locations and my experience had not been bad. Because of this I decided to give these guys a shot. What a horrible idea...  I got the worst mofongo I've ever eaten in my life. The chicharron was like a piece of rubber, it tasted like it had been there for a month and then they reheated it.  They served us some carne salada which tasted as if it had been marinated for a month. It tasted somewhat rancid but was edible.  I ordered a morir soñando and the person who was making it took a sip for herself after she had served mine. I ordered to go. When I tasted it i noticed the orange juice had gone bad, like wine-like bad. I could only take one sip. She had tasted it and knew this and preferred not to say a thing and steal my 5 dollars.  All in all don't even bother coming at this place. This is a bar more than anything else and the food seems to be aimed at drunk people who can't taste how horrible the food served at this place is.  Stay away!
Horible the two ladies that work the front, they both where gambling with a older man that was at the counter. The place was Empty,dont get food here.
terrible customer service!!!! One of the girls is lucky I didn't slap her!
Music can be a bit loud but the food is amazing and the staff very friendly. ......a great cubian sandwich. ...
